EmailTemplate.name: SC-ISPOR-3rd-E-Blast
EmailTemplate.subject: ISPOR 2017 meetings available with Doctor Evidence's team
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|ISPOR 2017 meetings available with Doctor Evidence's team|*
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, I wanted to follow-up and see if you are interested in meeting with Doctor Evidence at the 22nd international ISPOR event coming up May 22nd – 24th in Boston.
The Doctor Evidence team will be conducting demonstrations of our evidence-based products and services in a meeting room at the Sheraton Boston hotel adjacent to the Convention Center. Let me know if you are interested in meeting on Monday, May 22nd, Tuesday, May 23rd, or Wednesday, May 24th?
Please click here if you are interested in scheduling time to meet.
Scott Clymer Vice President, Business Development Doctor Evidence 301 Arizona Avenue, Suite 301 Santa Monica, CA 90401 Wk: 623-326-0297
